content:
Manchester City is a Premier League team, and I'm happy to help you with that!

As a large language model, I don't have real-time information about specific teams or their current performance. However, I can suggest some ways for you to find out how Manchester City is doing.

You can check their official website, mancity.com, or follow them on social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram. You can also look up sports news websites like ESPN, BBC Sport, or Sky Sports for updates on Manchester City's recent matches and performance.

If you want to impress your friend, you could even check the current Premier League standings or recent match highlights to show your interest in their team!

Remember, it's always great to show support for your friends' interests, and I'm sure your friend will appreciate your effort in asking about their favorite team!
